scripts.dev: zola serve --interface 0.0.0.0 --base-url 192.168.1.20 & npx tailwindcss -i styles/styles.css -o static/styles.css --watch
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i styles/styles.css -o static/styles.css --minify; zola build
scripts.upload: ssh rohit@192.168.1.11 'cd ~/docker/shadowdark/; docker-compose down; rm -r public/'; scp -r public/ rohit@192.168.1.11:docker/shadowdark/; ssh rohit@192.168.1.11 'cd ~/docker/shadowdark/; docker-compose up -d'
